text:
Local Government Order 2016

I make the following order under section 137(1)(b) of the Local Government Act 1993 .

1 February 2016

PETER GUTWEIN

Minister for Planning and Local Government

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government Order 2016 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Transfer of land to Flinders Council
    The land situated at Main Street, Lady Barron in Tasmania, comprised in Volume 86322, Folio 1 of the Register kept under section 33 of the Land Titles Act 1980 , is transferred to the Flinders Council.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 24 February 2016

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
